data.title: VentureRadar
data.meta_description: Rusnano (formerly Russian Corporation of Nanotechnologies) is a government-owned joint-stock company created as a Private Equity and Venture Capital... ... Find out more about Rusnano including the VentureRadar Innovation and Growth scores, Similar Companies and more.
data.text:
Website: http://www.rusnano.com/

Rusnano (formerly Russian Corporation of Nanotechnologies) is a government-owned joint-stock company created as a Private Equity and Venture Capital Vehicle by the government of Russia and aimed at commercializing developments in nanotechnology. Rusnano's task is to create by 2015 a nano-industry in the country that will make marketable products worth 900 billion rubles ($29 billion). In April 2012 they invested US $79m in Quantenna Communications, a manufacturer of semiconductors for wireless networks and devices. According to a press release issued by Rusnano, this investment will leverage synergies between Quantenna's portfolio and a number of nanotechnology initiatives that are under way at RUSNANO.

Wikipedia

Similar Companies:

Skolkovo

Russia

Privately Held

Skolkovo Foundation is overseeing the creation of the Innovation Center, composed of more than 1,800 high-tech startups, Technopark, Skolkovo Institute of Technology, Skolkovo city. The cumulative revenue of Skolkovoâ€™s startups reached $2,5 billion, brought in more than $186 million in investment, created 27,000 jobs and filled over 1,100 patent applications.

Bionanoplus

Spain

Privately Held

Bionanoplus is a drug delivery company specialized in providing polymeric nanoencapsulation solutions. Bionanoplus has solved the scalability problem of traditional nanoparticle manufacturing methods avoiding the use of volatile organic solvents, thus it ensures an easy and cheap production at any scale that can be performed using standard equipment and techniques. Bionanoplus has developed several proprietary technology platforms to obtain nanoparticle-based systems without using volatile organic solvents. Product areas: Hair loss; Nail infections; Mucosal vaccines; Cosmetics; Mucosal treatments; Topical drug delivery.

Plastic Logic

United Kingdom

Privately Held

Plastic Logic is the leader in the field of plastic electronics. Since being founded by researchers from the Cavendish Laboratory at Cambridge University, Plastic Logic has been at the forefront of research and investment into plastic electronics. We have achieved many technological firsts in making plastic electronics a reality. The company was the first to fully industrialise the mass production of plastic electronics in the world's first plastic electronics factory, achieving production yields of plastic electronic displays comparable to the LCD industry.

Plasticenergy

Spain

Privately Held

We offer a global solution to help everyone prevent plastic pollution, by transforming previously unrecyclable plastic waste into a valuable resource. Our patented, low carbon footprint technology converts valueless plastic waste into alternative fuels, or oil (TACOIL) for making new virgin (foodsafe) plastics, closing the plastic loop and creating a circular economy. The conversion from plastic to plastic prevents plastic pollution and could save up to $300 billion worth of plastic dumped in landfills each year.

Primus Power

USA

Privately Held

Primus Power is a California-headquartered provider of low-cost, long-life and long-duration energy storage systems. The Company's flow batteries are shipping to U.S. and international commercial/industrial, data center, microgrid, utility, and military customers. With technical innovations protected by 34 patents in 9 countries/regions, the Company's EnergyPod systems offer exceptional reliability, modularity, and energy density at an industry-leading low total cost of ownership. www.primuspower.com
